card.name: Dragon WAW
card.text: Flying

card.name: Memory of Home WAW
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, you may create an X/X black Spirit creature token that can’t block, where X is its mana value. Do this only once on each of your turns.

card.name: Spirit Token WAW

prop.notes: !related Memory of Home; Shapes in the Pools; Corrupted Wish; Remain Steady; Excess of Potential; Wish for Destruction; Wish for Power;

card.text: This creature can’t block.

card.name: Story of a Dead Plane WAW
card.text: This enchantment is all colors. Sacrifice this enchantment: Until end of turn, lands you control gain “{T}: Add one mana of any color.”

card.name: Wonder Archon WAW
card.text: This creature is all colors.

card.name: New Tensuo Luminary WAW

prop.notes: New Tensuo Luminary Token; !related New Tensuo Luminary;

card.text: Whenever another creature with base power 1 or less enters under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. This ability triggers only once each turn. (This token’s mana value is {W}.)

card.name: Lakebed Wrudge WAW
card.text: You may look at the top card of your library any time. As long as you control another permanent named Lakebed Wrudge, you may play lands and cast spells from the top of your library. {T}: Mill a card. (This token’s mana cost is 1U.)

card.name: Anything and Everything WAW
card.text: Choose one— • [Exile up to one target nonland permanent with mana value 1 or less.] • [Scry 2, then draw a card.] • [Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.] Impetus WUBRG (You may cast this from your graveyard as a sorcery with only the text in square brackets for its impetus cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Cloudeater Drake WAW
card.text: Flying When this creature enters, draw a card. (This token’s mana cost is 2U.)

card.name: Copy WAW
card.text: (This token can be used to represent a token that’s a copy of a permanent.)

card.name: Demon WAW
card.text: Flying This creature can’t block.

card.name: Flowering Germinus WAW
card.text: When Flowering Germinus enters, creatures you control with base power 1 or less get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn. (This token’s mana cost is 1G/WG/W.)

card.name: Gilded Ancient WAW
card.text: Vigilance When this creature enters, target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control. (This token’s mana cost is 5G.)

card.name: Ilcan Entrancer WAW
card.text: When Ilcan Entrancer enters, choose one — • Tap target creature. Put a stun counter on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.) • Create a tapped 3/3 green Beast creature token. Put a stun counter on it.

card.name: Ilcan Keyseeker WAW
card.text: When this creature enters, untap target creature and put a +1/+1 counter on it. If that creature is a Wonder, put an additional +1/+1 counter on it. (This token’s mana cost is 1W.)

card.name: Kindly Skywinder WAW
card.text: When this creature enters, target creature you control gains flying until end of turn. (This token’s mana cost is 3W.)

card.name: Music of the Deepholt WAW

prop.notes: Music of the Deepholt Token; !related Music of the Deepholt;

card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. (This token’s mana cost is 2U.)

card.name: New Tensuo Clergy WAW

prop.notes: New Tensuo Clergy Token; !related New Tensuo Clergy;

card.text: Whenever this creature or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. (This token’s mana cost is 2B.)

card.name: New Tensuo Vanguard WAW

prop.notes: New Tensuo Vanguard Token; !related New Tensuo Vanguard

card.text: When this creature enters, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn. (This token’s mana cost is 4W.)

card.name: Wonder WAW

prop.notes: !related Scrappy Wisp-Speaker; Abrasive Trailblazer<2>; Blossoming Comprehension; Blossoming Dissenter; Antlerweaver; Blinding Majesty<2>; Blossoming Conscience; Citadel Repository; Cathexis, Soul Aspect; Starsea Slayer<3>; Starseeker Deva; New Tensuo Calmkeeper; Polymorphic Wispweaver<2>;

card.text: This creature is all colors.

card.name: Borderholt Herdcaller WAW
card.text: 4G, Exile a card from your graveyard: [Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.] Activate only as a sorcery. Impetus 4G (You may cast this from your graveyard as a sorcery with only the text in square brackets for its impetus cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Redefinition WAW
card.text: When this creature enters, up to one target creature’s power and toughness each become equal to this creature’s power and toughness until this creature leaves the battlefield. (This token’s mana cost is 3U.)

card.name: Stardust Haze WAW
card.text: Flash When this enchantment enters, exile target nonland permanent you don’t control until this enchantment leaves the battlefield. (This token’s mana cost is 3W.)

card.name: Ageless Caretaker WAW
card.text: During your turn, this creature has indestructible and vigilance. This creature gets +1/+0 for each other creature you control. (This token’s mana cost is 4W.)

card.name: New Tensuo Physician WAW

prop.notes: New Tensuo Physician Token; !related New Tensuo Physician;

card.text: When this creature enters, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. If it was a land or multicolored card, you gain 5 life. (This token’s mana cost is 4G.)

card.name: Vrep WAW
card.text: This creature can’t be blocked by more than one creature. Augmented — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you’ve spent WUBRG to cast spells this turn, put a number of +1/+1 counters on target creature equal to this creature’s power. (This token’s mana cost is 4G.)

card.name: Worldsoul Ambassador WAW
card.text: When Worldsoul Ambassador enters, create a 3/3 green Beast creature token. {2}, Discard Worldsoul Ambassador: Pursue Wonder. (Reveal a basic land or Wonder card you own from your sanctum and put it into your hand.)
